plot: After flexing his muscles around the city, Carcetti faces his first dilemma when a group of ministers protests Herc's mistreatment of one of their own. Randy gets the cold shoulder at school. Omar and Reynaldo pay a menacing visit to Proposition Joe, with their own proposition. Freamon has a revelation at a crime scene that promises to blow the lid off an unsolved mystery.—WyattJones

Disturbed by the death of his crewmember, Bodie becomes concerned about working for Marlo. Colvin experiences first-hand Namond's difficult home life and begins to bond with him, as the pilot program comes under threat from the education board. After Bubbles takes his revenge on Herc, Carcetti faces a dilemma when a minister makes a serious allegation. Randy experiences bullying from his school mates after word gets out that he's a snitch, with Prez, Carver, Freamon, and Bunk quickly putting together Herc's involvement. Sherrod returns to Bubbles's shack. Omar learns Prop Joe, Slim Charles, and Marlo are working together, and makes a difficult demand of Joe. Daniels is promoted to Colonel, and takes over as CID commander, Pearlman joins homicide as lead prosecutor, Freamon is placed in charge of a reconstituted MCU, and Valchek tells Rawls that Carcetti will never appoint him as commissioner, with Daniels instead being groomed for the job, something Burrell and Davis have already figured out. Meanwhile, Carcetti decides to bump police salaries 5% and issue a new mandate for arrests.—Bertaut
